title: Love's Wicked Game: A Provocative, Persuasive Story of Love, Lust and Money
description: Brad Williamson was a successful real estate investor. He had the perfect marriage until Helen Dougherty, a past acquaintance, re-emerged in his life. After almost losing everything, she sultrily, seductively, and wickedly contrived a scheme to gain it all back. Helen found a way to threaten his wife's professional career and community outreach. She dreamed of starting a new life with Brad. An entertaining journey then began that involved love, steamy romance, and deceit as she wielded her sexual influence over a married man.
author: Eddie   Johnson
